roleset.name: playing games

example.name: both args
example.text: This month All Slots enhances player's casino gaming with the release of Microgaming Viper lobby design.

example.name: arg0
example.text: Jesse has always approached his gaming with the relaxed attitude

example.name: arg1
example.text: On Indian gaming , I 'll mention that the Navajo Nation put casino gambling on the ballot twice .
example.note: Here, "Indian" refers to the proprietors of the games, which is being used as a descriptor of the type of game (gambling).

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No corresponding verb frame or VNcls.
